page.title: 19A Young Man of Needingworth.
page.content: Robin is 21 years old, single, and was born, and has lived, in Needing worth all his life. He likes living here because he thinks most people are friendly. He lives with his family. His elder brother lives in Brighton. (His brother worked as a chef in a local inn, but moved because he was offered a flat and a job in Brighton.) Robin has a darkroom in his bedroom and develops his own films in his spare time. He thinks there are not enough facillities for young people but there are enough sports. He would like to see a youth club and a disco once a month. The biggest changes in his life were,learning to drive,going to and leaving secondary school.He owns a car and likes to get away from things occasionally.He works at the local butcher's shop,he finds the work boring at times.
